original_title: Big Blue In The Boiler Room
overview: The heat is on with Big Blue in the Boiler Room. Three intense scenes with sizzling sex. I am honored to introduce to you Jake Deckard and George Glass in their first adult performances. For their first time on film George and Jake are amazing. Both men are hung, hunky, and incredibly sexual. What more could I ask for.
title: Big Blue In The Boiler Room
